mapper.select: SELECT A.CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN , NVL(D.DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS DP_SUM_AMT /*입금합계금액[AS-IS:입금액계]*/ , NVL(G.DLQ_MCN, 0) AS DLQ_MCN /*연체개월수[AS-IS:연체개월]*/ /* 미수금액 : 판매금액 - 입금합계금액*/ , NVL(C.ISTM_AMT, 0) - NVL(D.DP_SUM_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /*미수금액[AS-IS:미수금계]*/ , '' AS FULPY_DT /*완불일자[AS-IS:완불일자]*/ , NVL(E.BU_NOTI_DT, '') AS BU_NOTI_DT /*부담통보일자[AS-IS:부담통보]*/ , NVL(F.REDF_DT, '') AS REDF_DT /*되물림일자[AS-IS:되물림일자]*/ , NVL(F.ADSB_DT, '') AS ADSB_DT /*재지급일자[AS-IS:재지급일자]*/ /* 완불예정금액 : 할부개월수 = 0이면 0, 아니면 판매금액 - 입금합계금액*/ , CASE WHEN A.ISTM_MCN = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(C.ISTM_AMT, 0) - NVL(D.DP_SUM_AMT, 0) END AS FULPY_EXP_AMT /*완불예정금액[AS-IS:완불예정금액]*/ /* 입금합계금액 / 월할부금액*/ , NVL(TRUNC(NVL(D.DP_SUM_AMT, 0) / NULLIF (A.MM_ISTM_AMT,0)),0) AS MPY_TN /*납부회차[AS-IS:납회회수]*/ , A.ISTM_MCN - NVL(TRUNC(NVL(D.DP_SUM_AMT, 0) / NULLIF (A.MM_ISTM_AMT,0)),0) AS RES_TN /*잔여회차[AS-IS:잔여회수]*/ , NVL(G.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT /*기말연체금액[AS-IS:연체금액]*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A /*계약상세*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ C /*WELLS매출월마감내역*/ ON A.CNTR_NO = C.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = C.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND C.SL_CL_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') /*매출마감년월*/ AND C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ /* TO-BE 입금구분코드에 전금이 포함되어 있기에. 전금 처리 방안이 나오면 다시 확인 처리 필요*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN /* AS-IS CWIJUB 입금종류(1:할부금,2:매변,3:손료) -> TO-BE RVE_DV_CD 수납구분코드로 용도변경 사용*/ /* 입금금액 합 : 입금구분코드 = 입금 AND 수납구분코드 = 월납입액(할부금, 렌탈료) -> SUM(수납금액)*/ /* 입금구분코드 = 환불 AND 수납구분코드 = 월납입액(할부금, 렌탈료) -> SUM(수납금액) * -1*/ , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN DP_DV_CD = '1' AND RVE_DV_CD = '03' THEN RVE_AMT WHEN DP_DV_CD = '2' AND RVE_DV_CD = '03' THEN RVE_AMT * -1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS DP_SUM_AMT /*입금합계금액*/ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL /*수납상세*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ AND RVE_PROCS_YN = 'Y' /*수납처리여부*/ AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/ AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*계약일련번호*/ GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN ) D ON A.CNTR_NO = D.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = D.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FEDD_BU_NOTI_RGST_BAS E /*부담통보등록기본*/ ON A.CNTR_NO = E.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = E.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND E.BU_DDTN_OJ_RGST_STAT_CD = '01' /*부담공제대상등록상태코드[01:등록]*/ AND E.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ /* 일시불은 한차례 되물림과 재지급이 발생함. -> 재지급조건이 완불임.*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_REDF_ADSB_BAS F /*되물림재지급기본*/ ON A.CNTR_NO = F.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = F.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND F.REDF_ADSB_SN = 1 /*되물림재지급일련번호*/ AND F.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS G /*연체기본*/ ON A.CNTR_NO = G.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = G.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ AND G.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') /*실적년월*/ AND G.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/ WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/ AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*계약일련번호*/ AND A.SELL_TP_CD = '1' /*판매유형코드[1:할부]*/ AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /*데이터삭제여부*/
